duties_responsibilities.duty: Answers and transfers phone calls, screening when necessary.
Schedule appointments and projects in Dataforma.
Coordinates and schedules travel, meetings, and appointments for managers or supervisors.
Collaborates with schedules and plans that allocate available resources to best serve client or customer needs.
Maintains data used in software applications.
Prepares and send invoices to clients.
Retrieves information as requested from records, email, minutes, and other related documents; prepares reports of data when needed.
Responds to and resolves administrative inquiries and questions.
Welcomes and directs visitors and clients.
Responsible for the maintenance of company vehicles.
Maintains a system for recording expenses.
Performs other related duties as assigned.

skills.skill: Working knowledge of basic assessments offered by the company.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills.
Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite or related software.
Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
Basic understanding of clerical procedures and systems such as recordkeeping and filing.
Resolves minor processing problems; seeks assistance from supervisor or other appropriate staff for issues beyond immediate expertise.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree required; Bachelor’s degree in related field preferred.
